resources.string: Gen-chi is a mini mobile application project developed to help users learn and understand the Japanese language.

The app name was referenced from the Japanese saying "Gengo o shiru koto wa, kenja e no Michi" which translates to "You live a new life for every new language you speak. If you know only one language, you live only once".
Please enter the details below to continue.
Bernadette de Jesus is a Junior Software Engineer who aspires to become a Mobile Developer. She loves being weird. She built this application to cultivate her skills and learn nihonggo.
